Source: components/NoInternetTip.js

import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { View, Text, Dimensions } from 'react-native';
import AppTheme from '../appthemes/AppTheme';
import ThemeText from '../appthemes/components/ThemeText';
import ColorUtils from '../appthemes/ColorUtils';

const { width, height } = Dimensions.get('window');

/**
 * no internet tip ui component
 */
class NoInternetTip extends Component {
  render() {
    return (
      <View style={{
        height:24,
        width: width - 20,
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center', 
        position: 'absolute', 
        borderRadius: 4,
        top:0, 
        left: 0, 
        margin: 6,
        backgroundColor: ColorUtils.getColorWithOpacity(AppTheme.getColorPalette().chipsBgColor, 0.9)}}>
        <ThemeText 
        text='No Internet Connection'
        fontProfile='FontProfile10'
        color={AppTheme.getColorPalette().chipsFgColor}
        />
      </View>
    );
  }
}

module.exports = {
  NoInternetTip
}
